remarks: In a finite graph the number of edges which contain a given vertex is also finite, analogous to ~ fiusgraedgfi .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 15-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
fiusgedgfiALT.v $e |- V = ( 1st ` G ) $.
fiusgedgfiALT.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
fiusgedgfiALT $p |- ( ( G e. FinUSGrph /\ N e. V ) -> { e e. E | N e. e } e. Fin ) $.
$d E e $.
$d G e $.
$d N e $.
$d V e $.
